special_text:
Urenkal, Void Recurrence enters with a loyalty counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast her.
[+1]: Create an X/3 colorless Void Nightmare creature token, where X is the number of colors among nontoken permanents you control. 
[-2]: You may reveal a card you own from outside the game that's three or more colors. Put that card into your hand.
[-7]: Shuffle all other permanents, cards in hands and in graveyards into their owner's libraries. You draw 7 cards.
